name: Super Weird 3-Level Adventure of A Random Pixel Boy
name_original: Super Weird 3-Level Adventure of A Random Pixel Boy
description: Super Weird 3-Level.. wait I already used this description, is a platformer with the main gimmick being dashing, which is tottaly not stolen from Mighty No.9! There's no story to this game whatsoever. There's only three levels. So yeah, a bad platformer with bad collisions and bad everything! And also this game works with a controller.
